messages.subject: sword care
messages.msgSnippet: Hi guys, Is it acceptable to use those white latex gloves when handling a sword instead of the cotton ones ? Or is this a big no-no ? The latex ones will not
messages.messageBody:
Hi guys,

Is it acceptable to use those white latex gloves when handling a sword
instead of the cotton ones ?

Or is this a big no-no ?

The latex ones will not lett any fats or acids through, but does anyone
know if they are treated is such a fashion that it might damage the
blade ?

- Matt


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
